types.name: WebpVp8BoolDecoder
types.summary: Minimal VP8 boolean decoder scaffold for parsing the control header. This is intentionally small and focused; it will be extended as VP8 decoding grows.

types.name: WebpVp8BoolEncoder
types.summary: VP8 boolean encoder for managed VP8 bitstreams.

types.name: WebpVp8Decoder

types.name: WebpVp8lDecoder
types.summary: Managed VP8L lossless decoder.

types.summary: Managed VP8L lossless encoder (subset) for RGBA images.

types.name: WebpWriter
types.summary: Managed WebP writer (VP8L lossless subset + VP8 lossy intra + animation container).
